gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Pelicans 114, Pistons 101
gameRecap.excerpt: New Orleans defeats Detroit, 114-101. For New Orleans, Zion Williamson led the way with 36 points, seven rebounds, six assists, and two steals while aided by CJ McCollum (23 points, seven assists) in the victory. Jaden Ivey finished with 16 points (three 3PM) and four assists with Chimezie Metu recording 17 points, eight rebounds, and three assists for Detroit in the losing effort. New Orleans improves to 44-27, while Detroit moves to 12-59 in the loss.
